title: Pixel 3a XL, Adding Sim to e-sim
content:
I have a 3a XL with Android 10.  I need to add a SIM to E-Sim.  I have read the help article but it seems to be missing some information.
I can enable the "2 number" feature but exactly what is the process to add it as an e-sim?  Do I have to remove my original Sim and insert the 2nd Sim and then add it as an e-sim?  And then replace with my original Sim?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
